edu.rit.image.png

Class ChunkOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.image.png.ChunkOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChunkOutput, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ChunkOutputStream
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChunkOutput, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable
    Class ChunkOutputStream provides an object for writing PNG image chunks to an OutputStream.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChunkOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream out)
      Construct a new chunk output stream that will write to the given underlying output stream.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close this chunk output stream.
      void flush()
      Flush this chunk output stream.
      void write(Chunk chunk)
      Write the given chunk to this chunk output stream.
      void writeSignature()
      Write the PNG file signature to this chunk output stream.
